name: Saitoshi by Virtuals
description: Bitcoin's ecosystem is rapidly expanding with multiple L2 solutions, such as Arch Network, Bitlayer, and Citrea, alongside Ordinals, Runes, and BRC-20 tokens. Despite the innovation, the complexity of navigating these opportunities presents significant challenges: Fragmented User Experience: Swapping, bridging, and yield farming require advanced knowledge and constant monitoring. Saitoshi on Virtuals Saitoshi is the first Bitcoin-native portfolio management and market insights tool, launched as a token on Virtuals to provide users with two core AI agents: X.com AI Agent: A customizable AI for social media and workflow automation. Automates social media strategies and integrates AI into personal workflows on X (Twitter). Bridges everyday interactions with AI-driven optimization tools. Bitcoin Ecosystem AI Agent: A comprehensive tool for managing portfolios and analyzing Bitcoin L1/L2 assets, including Ordinals, Runes, and BRC-20. Provides real-time analytics, portfolio management, and market insights for Bitcoin-native assets. Simplifies DeFi complexity with actionable insights. “We start simple with v0 on Virtuals as a terminal for Bitcoin-native investors to refine technology before expanding to vB, a tokenized AI agent marketplace on Bitcoin.”
